Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Prading mpuuyas di, meyah remux sapah ttgsaan ka mptgesa, “Tutuy! Tmhuku!” mesa ka mdudul miyan.
It’s time for class , the teacher walked into the classroom, and the monitor said: “Stand up! Salute!”
我今天七點到學校。: 上課了，老師走進教室，班長說:「起立!敬禮!」

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Paru ba kari nami mesa, “Sndamac su bale mptgesa.”
We said loudly, “Hi, teacher.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們大聲的說:「老師好。」

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Muuyas miyan de, tgsaan nami na kari ssepu ka mptgesa.
In class, the teacher taught us the Seediq language of numbers.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，老師教我們數字的族語。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Smnegul nami mptgesa smepu ma, muuyas nami uyas sspegan.
We followed the teacher to read, we sang the number song.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們跟著老師唸，我們唱了數字歌。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Eguw bale ka snlhayan mu kari miyan Seediq.
I have learned many Seediq languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我學會好多族語。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mosa ku sapah pyasan klaali, smluhe ku kari nami Seediq klaali, saun mu pqbahang bubu mu.
I go to school every day, I learn the Seediq language every day, and I want to tell my mother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我天天上學，我天天在學校學族語，我要講給媽媽聽。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Walis Pawan ka ngayan mu yaku.
My name is Walis Pawan.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的名字是Walis Pawan。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Pawan Dakis ka ngayan na tama mu.
My dad’s name is Pawan Dakis.
我今天七點到學校。: 我爸爸的名字是Pawan Dakis。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Robo Walis ka ngayan na bubu mu.
My mother’s name is Robo Walis.
我今天七點到學校。: 我媽媽的名字是Robo Walis。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Maxal ka knkawas mu saya di.
I am 10 years old.
我今天七點到學校。: 我今年10歲。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Niqan ku kingal qbsuran rseno ka yaku, Takun ka ngayan na, maxal kingal ka knkawas na saya di.
I have a brother, his name is Takun, he is 11 years old.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個哥哥，他叫Takun，他今年11歲。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Ga miyan suupu muuyas kingal sapah pyasan.
We study in the same school.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們在同一間學校讀書。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Smkuxul nami muuyas uyas kana miyan ka qbsuran mu rseno.
Both my brother and I like to sing.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和哥哥都喜歡唱歌。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Smkuxul ku lmanguy ka yaku, mgduru de mosa nami lmanguy kana ka tnsapah mu.
I like swimming. During the holidays, our whole family go swimming together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我喜歡游泳，放假的時候，我們全家會一起去游泳。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Smkuxul ku mgkela dangi bgurah ka yaku, suupu miyan mosa muuyas uyas ma lmanguy.
I love meeting new people, we can sing and swim together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我喜歡認識新朋友，我們可以一起唱歌和游泳。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Laqi ku Seediq ka yaku.
I am an Seediq child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我是賽德克族的小孩。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Ga Mhebu ka sapah mu yaku.
Our family lives in Mhebu.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家住在馬赫坡。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Rima hei kana ka tnsapah miyan.
There are five people in our family.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家共有五個人。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Teru nami kana mtswai.
There are three brothers and sisters in our family.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家有三個兄弟姊妹。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Ga ku suupu meniq tama mu, bubu mu, qbsuran mu rseno ma qbsuran mu mqedil.
I live with my father, mother, brother and sister.
我今天七點到學校。: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥和姊姊住在一起。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Bbaro hnyegan na ka tama mu, kesacu ka heya.
My father is tall and he is a policeman.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很高，我的爸爸是警察。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Rqeling ka bubu mu, ga mgu-ising ka heya.
My mother is thin and my mom is a doctor.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的媽媽很瘦，我的媽媽是醫生。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Rngagun nami na kari Seediq meniq sapah ka tama mu.
My father speaks the ethnic language with us at home.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸在家會和我們說族語。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Rbagan ka sngayan laqi muuyas de meyah ku alang klaali.
We will all go back to the tribe during the summer vacation.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們暑假都會回部落。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Suupu nami mosa qmerac qpatun yami ka qbsuran mu rsemo ma, qbsuran mu mqedil.
My brothers and sisters and I will catch frogs together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和兄姊會一起抓青蛙。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Kuxul mu riyung ka seediq tnsapah mu.
I like our family very much.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很喜歡我們家的人。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Maha nami theyaq nganguc yami ka bubu mu ali saya.
I went out with my mother today.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天我和媽媽要出去玩。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mblawa ka karac diyan, ini ktilux ma ini ksekuy, tleetu ka bgihur.
The sky is blue during the day, the weather is neither cold nor hot, and the wind is cool.
我今天七點到學校。: 白天的天空很藍，天氣不冷也不熱，風很涼爽。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mekan nami ppuqun bobo dupi, so sapo ka ledax hido cmebu hei nami, muuxun bale.
We ate bread on the grass, the sun was shining on us, and it was very warm.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們在草地上吃著麵包，陽光灑在身上，非常溫暖。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Bbiyan de mgtanah ka karac di.
In the afternoon, the sky turned red.
我今天七點到學校。: 下午，天空變紅了。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Smiling ku bubu mu, malux mgtanah ka karac.
I asked my mother why the sky is red.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問媽媽，為甚麼天空是紅色的。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mesa cmiyuk ka bubu mu, “Yaani psbgihur paru.”
Mom said, maybe the typhoon is coming.
我今天七點到學校。: 媽媽說:「可能是颱風要來了。」

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Uka plabu keeman ka karac baro, pkriyak ka pngerah di.
There were no clouds in the sky at night, and the stars came out.
我今天七點到學校。: 晚上天上沒有雲，星星出來了。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Maha nami sapah ka yami duri di.
We were going home too.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們也要回家了。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Moda nami eluw ssaan sapah, drunun mu pngerah ka sntangan mu.
On the way home, I made a wish with the stars,
我今天七點到學校。: 在回家的路上，我跟星星許願。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Naka ini eyah ka bgihur paru, mkmosa ku theyaq nganguc dungan.
I hope the typhoon doesn't come, I still want to go out to play again.
我今天七點到學校。: 希望颱風不要來，我還想再出去玩。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Ga ssiyo sapah mu ka sapah pyasan, mkkesa ku klaali mosa sapah pyasan ma meyah sapah.
My school is next to our house, I walk to school every day, and I also walk home.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的學校在我們家旁邊，我天天走路去學校，也走路回家。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Ini kparu ka sapah pyasan nami yami, ini keeguw ka laqi muuyas, mgkela nami kana.
Our school is not big, there are not many students, everyone knows each other.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們學校不大，沒有很多學生，大家互相認識。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mosa msseli caw-cang kana ka laqi muuyas, suupu mtheyaq boru ma, suupu mpprengo.
All the children will gather in the playground, play ball and chat together.
我今天七點到學校。: 所有小朋友會聚在操場，一起玩球、一起聊天。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Msuupu theyaq yami ka dmptgesa duri, so hari kingal tnsapah paru ka sapah pyasan.
The teachers also play with us, the school is one big family.
我今天七點到學校。: 老師們也會和我們一起玩，學校是個大家庭。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Smkesik miyan klaali ka yami, blequn nami bale smkesik ka sapah ttgsaan.
We have to clean every day, and everyone has to clean the classroom.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們每天都要打掃，大家要把教室打掃乾淨。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mosa smerus bais ka duma ma, mosa smkesi ceka dheran ka duma.
Some people clean the windows, some sweep the floor.
我今天七點到學校。: 有些人去擦窗戶，有些人去掃地。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Ma, saun nami smkesi kana ssiyo sapah pyasan, mddayo mskingal lnglungan kana ma, uka rtrutiq ka sapah nami pyasan.
We will also clean every corner of the school. Everyone works together, and the school is very clean every day.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們還會打掃學校的各個角落，大家分工合作，學校每天都很乾淨。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Ciga, mnosa ku qmita tama mu rudan.
Yesterday, I went to visit my grandpa in the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天，我去部落拜訪爺爺。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Bsiyaq miyan ba ini pqqita di, lnglungun mu riyung ka heya.
We haven’t seen each other for a long time and I miss him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們很久沒有見面了，我很想念他。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Qmita ba yaku ka tama mu rudan de, pqdalun ku na sikwa ma, pmahun ku na ocya.
As soon as grandpa saw me, he invited me to eat watermelon and drink tea.
我今天七點到學校。: 爺爺一看到我，就請我吃西瓜，請我喝茶。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Cheya bale puqun ka sikwa pnhmaan na tama mu rudan, bale ba malu riyung puqun.
The watermelon grown by grandpa is very sweet and really delicious.
我今天七點到學校。: 爺爺種的西瓜很甜，真的很好吃。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Kuxul mu bale ka ocya na tama mu rudan duri, malu ba mahun duri.
I also like grandpa’s tea, it’s tasted good too.
我今天七點到學校。: 我也喜歡爺爺的茶，也很好喝。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Ceka na ali de, suupu nami pure ido puqun ceka na ali ka yami bubu mu rudan.
At noon, I cooked lunch with my grandma.
我今天七點到學校。: 中午的時候，我和奶奶一起煮午餐。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Eguw bale hnprayan na bubu mu rudam, niqan qcurux, hei rodux, tmurak ma waso bunga.
Grandma cooked a big lunch, including fish, chicken, pumpkin, and snails.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶煮了很豐盛的午餐，有魚、有雞、有南瓜、還有地瓜葉。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mnekan nami ido ceka na ali de, mosa nami kmetuy sama qnalang.
After lunch, we went to the vegetable garden to pick vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 吃完午餐後，我們去菜園摘菜。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Eguw ba bnege na bunga, sari ma qucun ka bubu mu rudan, adis sapah kesun ku na hiya.
Grandma brought me a lot of sweet potatoes, taro and buckwheat, and asked me to take them home.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶拿了很多地瓜、芋頭和蕗蕎給我，要我帶回家。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mnswaye ku dheya de, meeyah ku qmita yamu bobo na dungan kesun mu hiya.
I said goodbye to them and said I’d see them next time.
我今天七點到學校。: 我跟他們道別，說下次再去看他們。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Desun miyan na tong-uyen ka mptgesa nami ali saya, mtbeku nami maruy kipu rhengun na.
Today the teacher took us to the zoo, and we lined up at the gate to buy tickets.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天老師帶我們去動物園，我們在門口排隊買票。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mremux nami tong-uyen de, mesa ka mptgesa, “Berah nii we qbheni so mllamu ma, bukuy na we quyu so mllamu, sai naq rmigo.”
After entering the zoo, the teacher said, There are birds in the front and snakes in the back
我今天七點到學校。: so you can visit them yourself.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34669/5: 進入動物園後，老師說:「前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。」

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Miicu ku quyu ka yaku, kika ini ku osa qmita.
I'm afraid of snakes, so I don't look at snakes.
我今天七點到學校。: 我會怕蛇，所以我不看蛇類。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Eguw ba qbheni qtaan mu, ga skiya skiya bobo qhuni baro ma, ga mu qtaan ka tekung ga mtaqi beling qhuni duri.
I saw a lot of birds flying around in the trees and saw owls sleeping in tree hollows.
我今天七點到學校。: 我看到了很多鳥，他們在樹上飛來飛去，還有看到貓頭鷹在樹洞裡睡覺。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Niqan dapa utux, dmai ma rkelic, uxe mu qntaan kana camac nii, qtaan mu saya de mqaras ku riyung.
There are elephants, horses and tigers in the zoo. I have never seen these animals before. I was really happy to see them today.
我今天七點到學校。: 動物園裡有大象、馬和老虎，我從前沒有看過這些動物，今天看到了真的很開心。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Eguw ba pnssingan mu, saun mu pqita tama bubu mu.
I took a lot of pictures and showed them to my parents.
我今天七點到學校。: 我拍了很多照片，給爸爸媽媽看。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mpsuupu ku tama bubu mu meyah bobo na.
Next time I will come with my parents.
我今天七點到學校。: 下次要跟爸爸媽媽一起來。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Maha miyan qmita swai tama nami Tay-tong ka ali gdregan nii.
This holiday, my sister and I went to Taitung to visit my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個假日，我和姊姊去台東拜訪叔叔。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Taapa nami rulu puniq kndalax Taype mmaha Taytong.
We took the train from Taipei to Taitung.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們從台北搭火車去臺東。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Dehuk nami Taytong de, mgeriq rulu meyah smterung yami ka swai tama nami.
When we arrived in Taitung, my uncle drove to the station to pick us up.
我今天七點到學校。: 到了台東，叔叔開車來車站接我們。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Ini ptheya sapah na swai tama nami daka rluwan rulu.
The station is not far from my uncle’s house, and it’s just a short drive away.
我今天七點到學校。: 車站離叔叔家沒有很遠，開車一下子就到了。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Niqan kingal mucang paru ka siyo sapah na swai tama miyan, taapa nami didensya mosa mucang.
There is a big ranch near my uncle’s house, and we rode bicycles to the ranch together.
我今天七點到學校。: 叔叔家附近有個很大的牧場，我們一起騎腳踏車到牧場。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Dehuk nami mucang de, desun nami na tmabu miric ma, taapa dmai ka sawi tama miyan.
In the ranch, my uncle took us to feed the sheep and ride horses.
我今天七點到學校。: 在牧場，叔叔帶我們餵羊和騎馬。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Keeman de, suupu nami mosa mekan ido suci.
In the evening, we went to the city to have dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 晚上，我們一起去市區吃飯。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Suci we eguw riyung rulu, kika taapa nami otobay mosa hiya.
There are a lot of cars in the city, so we go there by motorcycle.
我今天七點到學校。: 市區車子很多，所以我們騎摩托車去那裡。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mmeeyah nami de, wada hiya gguyan ka otobay nami di, uka naq brahan di ma, taapa nami basu meyah di.
When we were about to leave, we found that the motorcycle had been stolen, so we had to leave by bus.
我今天七點到學校。: 要離開的時候，發現摩托車被偷了，我們只好搭公車離開。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Nii miyan dehuk Taype ka saya di, ye na ga slayun ka otobay na sawi tama miyan de, ini nami kela duri.
Now that we are back in Taipei, I don’t know if my uncle’s motorcycle has been found.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我們回到台北了，不知道叔叔的摩托車找到了沒有。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Slaqi ku han we mneniq ku alang Gluban, mmaha ku muuyas sapah pyasan de, mosa ku meniq Taycong di, kika meniq ku naq Taycong hiya di.
When we were young, our family lived in Gluban. After I started school, we moved to Taichung and have been living in the city ever since.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我們家住在清流部落，上學以後，就搬到了臺中，一直在都市裡生活。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: muuyas ku ta-se de, mnsluhe ku kingl sslhayan kesun gaya nSeediq, kika klaun mu mesa lmlamu bale ka gaya dSeediq Taywang nii.
After I went to college, I took a course on aboriginal culture and learned that the aboriginal people in Taiwan have various and rich cultures.
我今天七點到學校。: 上了大學以後，我修了一堂關於原住民文化的課程，瞭解到臺灣原住民族有各式各樣豐富的文化。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: so kiya de, gdregan laqi muuyas rbagan knii, maha miyan qmita ma smiling drudan alang, anu mkmlela nami gaya miyan naq Seediq.
So this summer, my brother and I went back to our tribe to visit the elderly, hoping to understand the culture of our own ethnic group.
我今天七點到學校。: 因此，今年暑假時，我和哥哥回到部落訪問老人家，想要瞭解自己族群的文化。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: mmsepac kmxalan ka knkawas na rudan mu sapah hii di, ani si so hari knriso ka qtaun dungan.
The old man is already eighty years old, but he still looks like a middle-aged man.
我今天七點到學校。: 老人家已經八十歲了，但是看起來還像中年人。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: slingun mu mesa mkela su mrengo kari maanu dungan ka heya, mkela riyung mrengo kari miyan Seediq ka heya ma, mkela mrengo kari Tayal, kari Plmukan ma, kari Tanah Tunux duri.
I asked him which languages he knew, and he was fluent in Seediq, as well as Tayal, Hokkien and Japanese.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他會哪些語言，他的賽德克語說得很流利，也會說泰雅語、閩南語和日本話。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: smniling ku heya de kika klaun mu di, kela naq smnluhe kari Tanah Tunux slaqi ka heya ma, weewa Tayal ka qedil na, meniq so qqpahun na duri we, egu klaun na Khilan dungan, kika egu klegan ka kari klaun na mrengo.
I asked him to find out that he learned Japanese when he was a child, his wife is an Atayal, and he knows many Hokkien at work, so he can speak so many languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他才知道，原來他小時候就學日本話，太太是泰雅族人，而他工作上認識許多閩南人，所以他會說這麼多語言。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: mpprengo nami ciida we, eguw bale ka rnungagan na quri pphuling ma tmlenga ka rudan snlingan miyan.
During our interview, the old man talked about a lot of traditional knowledge about hunting.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們訪談的時候，老人家談論了許多關於狩獵的傳統知識。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: ani miyan naq ini hari klai qmbahang we, wada nami hii saangal qnawan ddilun ka kari na ma, wada nami ru-ing duri, blequn nami qmbhang bobo na dungan.
Although we could’t fully understand it, we could record it on our cell phones and listen to it more.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然我們沒有辦法完全聽懂，但是我們有用手機錄影，可以再仔細聆聽。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: slaqi ku han we ini ku kela gaya nami naq Seediq, msiqa ku bale qnSeediq mu naq.
When I was young, I didn’t understand the culture of my ethnic group, and I was a little embarrassed that I was an aborigine.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我不瞭解自己族群的文化，對於自己是原住民有點不好意思。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: kndudul eguw ka klaun mu di we, kika mkela ku mesa yami Seediq we ini ba pntena ma, qrasun mu bale.
The more I know, the more I feel that being a Seediq is unique and something to be proud of.
我今天七點到學校。: 瞭解愈多以後，愈覺得自己身為賽德克族人，是很獨特的，也很值得驕傲。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: mmaha alang keeman saya ka swai mu rseno.
My younger brother is going home this evening.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天傍晚，弟弟就要回家了。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: maha nami mari rodux sapah bbrigan yami ka bubu mu, phanguc nami malu ppuqun damac ido bbiyan na swai mu rseno.
My grandma and I went to the market to buy chickens and prepared a delicious dinner for my younger brother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和奶奶去市場買雞，準備煮好吃的晚餐給弟弟。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: mnoda nami so bbrigan sama, eguw sama hani nngalan ka bbrigan sama.
We passed the vegetable stand, which had a lot of fresh green vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了菜攤，菜攤有好多新鮮的青菜。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: bnari ku encay, qmagas ma nizing.
We bought water spinach, yams and carrots.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了空心菜、山藥和胡蘿蔔。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: ga rmengo ka mbaruy hei qhuni, “msibus ba puqun ka sputu mu ma aring mu mesa, brigi tikuh ho!” ga mesa.
The owner of the nearby fruit stand said: “My pineapples and peaches are very sweet. Buy some!”
我今天七點到學校。: 旁邊水果攤的老闆說:「我的鳳梨和桃子很甜，買一些吧!」

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: bnari nami sputu ma aring.
We bought pineapples and peaches.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了鳳梨和桃子。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: moda miyan so bbrigan siyang ma, mesa ka mbari siyan, “mbari namu maana we? mesa. Paru ma msiyang ka rodux saya, maha teru kbekuy ka kingal rodux.” mesa.
We passed the meat stall, and the boss said, “What do you want to buy? Today’s chickens are big and fat, and one is 300 NTD.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了肉攤，老闆說:「你要買什麼?今天的雞又大又肥，一隻300元。」

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: sgcuqi mkere brigun di mesa ka bubu mu ruda, ye ini huwa hridun tikuh kesi raw-pan mesa.
Grandma thought it was too expensive and asked the boss if it could be cheaper.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶覺得太貴了，問老闆可不可以便宜一點。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: ani si mhenuk bnrigan di mesa ka raw-pan, uka hhridan di mesa.
But the boss said that it is already very cheap and cannot be reduced any further.
我今天七點到學校。: 但老闆說已經很便宜，不能再減了。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: mesa ka rawpan mgbari qcurux, “Aguh mari qcurux mu mesa, paru ma mhenuk brigun” mesa.
The boss next door said, come and buy my fish, my fish is big and cheap.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔壁的老闆說:「來買我的魚，我的魚又大又便宜。」

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: mhiti na de bnari miyan rodux di ma, bnri nami ka qcurux duri di, asi maku kingal handay ka hnprayan nami dehuk sapah.
In the end we bought chicken and fish, and went home to cook a table of food.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後我們買了雞也買了魚，回家煮了一桌子的菜。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: bsiyaq nami bale mtara di, sreesa duri di.
After waiting for a long time, it was already dark.
我今天七點到學校。: 等了好久，天已經黑了。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: mgeriq qnawan sapah ka swai mu rseno, asi lux ini pgdregi ka supi, asi ka ali gdregan bobo meeyah di.
The younger brother called back and said that the army suddenly couldn’t take a vacation and would not be back until the next Sunday.
我今天七點到學校。: 弟弟打電話回來說，軍隊突然不能放假了，要下一個禮拜日才回來。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: nii eguw riyung ka hnprayan di, plaani kana eyah mekan di kesa.
Grandma said that she has cooked so much, so let’s eat together!
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶說已經煮了這麼多，叫大家一起來吃吧。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: splawa miyan ka dadal ma dangi miyan, aguh suupu mekan knkmalu ma eguw damac ido bbiyan.
We invited friends and family to have a great dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們邀請了親朋好友，一起來享用豐盛的晚餐。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: niqan kingl gnxalan mu kesun Pawan, cmhungi madis qyqeya klaali.
I have a classmate named Pawan, he often forgets to bring things.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個同學叫Pawan，他常常忘記帶東西。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: muuyas miyan sapah ttgsaan ma, kmbarux ppatis, serus ma patis pptasan na gnxalan ka heya.
During class, he borrowed pencils, erasers or notebooks from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，他跟同學借鉛筆、橡皮擦或是筆記本。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: mntexal, mndaha, mnteru, kbrexun daha qyqeya ka heya.
Once, twice, three times, everyone would lend him something.
我今天七點到學校。: 一次、兩次、三次，大家會借東西給他。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: ani si naqah kbrexun qyqeya ka heya, ini prihi klaali.
But he has a bad habit of often borrowing things but not returning them.
我今天七點到學校。: 但是他有個壞習慣，經常借了東西卻不還。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: mhiti de ini mkpkbarux heya ka kana daha di.
In the end, no one wanted to borrow anything from him.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後大家都不想借他東西了。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: niqan kingal ali, mosa nami cyaw-yo kana nami.
One day, we all went on an outing together.
我今天七點到學校。: 有一天，我們大家一起去郊遊。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: mkmaha psnganguc ka Pawan mkkesa nami moda eluw, ani si ga cmhungi madis we-sung-cu.
On the way, Pawan wanted to go to the bathroom, but he forgot to bring toilet paper.
我今天七點到學校。: 路途中，Pawan想上廁所，但他忘記帶衛生紙。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: smiling pkbarux gnxalan na ma, ini nami adis duri mesa kana ka dheya.
He borrowed toilet paper from his classmates, but everyone told him that I didn’t bring them either.
我今天七點到學校。: 他跟同學借衛生紙，可是大家都回他說，我也沒有帶耶。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: asi lux lmingis snyexan na ka Pawan. Mseyang mesa, “Ma namu ini pkbarux wesungcu yaku kana namu!!”
Pawan burst into tears. He said angrily, why don’t everyone lend me toilet paper!
我今天七點到學校。: Pawan急的哭了出來。他生氣的說:「為什麼大家都不借我衛生紙!!」

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: kesun peeyah gnxalan na, ado su naq ini adis ka isu ma, kbrexun su qyqeya de, ini su pririh klaali.
The classmate told him, because you didn’t bring it yourself, and you wouldn’t return the things lent to you!
我今天七點到學校。: 同學告訴他，因為你都不自己帶，而且借給你的東西，你都不會還!

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: ini beyo mosa sapah pyasan so kusun ka Pawan nii, wada na prihun gnxalan na kana qyqeya knbrexan na di.
The next day at school, Pawan arrived at school early and returned everything he had borrowed from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔天上學，Pawan很早就到學校了，Pawan把跟同學借的東西都還給同學們。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: ini ba klai kesun na dgnxalan na, maadis ku naq qyqeya bobo na di mesa, khwayun maku bale ka knbrexan namu qyqeya ka yaku berah na mesa duri.
Pawan apologized to the students and said that he would definitely bring his own things in the future, and thanked the classmates for their willingness to lend him things before.
我今天七點到學校。: Pawan向同學們道歉，並說他以後一定會自己帶東西，也謝謝同學們之前願意借他東西。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: seediq ptcamac alang ka tama mu.
My dad is a hunter of the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸是部落的獵人。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: slaqi ku, wada madis hlmadac ma halung ka tama mu daka swai na ma, wada lmiqu keeman.
When I was little, my dad and uncle would go out at night with hunting knives and guns.
我今天七點到學校。: 我小的時候，爸爸和叔叔會在晚上出門，帶著獵刀和獵槍。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: lmedax de, ga madis nngalan daha meyah sapah.
At daybreak, they returned with their prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 天亮時，他們就會帶著獵到的獵物回來。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: boyak ncugin ma rapic ncugin, duma naq we niqan ka tkurih duri.
Sometimes it was a boar, sometimes a flying squirrel, and occasionally a pheasant.
我今天七點到學校。: 有時候是山豬、有時候是飛鼠，偶爾也會有雉雞。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: psugun miyan rhengun alang ka nngalan han ma, saasu nami seediq alang.
They would divide the prey at the entrance of the village and share it with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 他們會在村口將獵物分好，分享給族人。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: skribu ku tama mu klaali, maha ku smnegul tama mu lmiqu.
Every time I quarreled with my father, I wanted to go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 我每次都會吵著爸爸，要跟著爸爸去打獵。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: paru su de desun su mu denu mesa ka tama mu.
Dad said that he would take me with me when I grew up.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說等我長大了他再帶我一起去。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: mkela paha tlenga ka rseno alang miyan duri, mkela paha durang ma qapi btunux.
The men of the tribe also trap their prey, making lasso traps and rock traps.
我今天七點到學校。: 部落的男人也會用陷阱抓獵物，他們會製作套索陷阱和石壓式陷阱。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: mkela riyung paha durang ka tama mu, mesa tama mu, drangun tkurih ka nii mesa, asi ta ka blequn qmita ka dapil na, psaun tuqil na ka dudrang mesa hii.
My dad is very good at making lasso traps. Dad said that this is used to catch pheasants. We have to carefully observe the footprints of the prey, and the traps should be placed on the path of the prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很會製作套索陷阱，爸爸說，這是用來捕抓雉雞的，我們要仔細觀察獵物的腳印，陷阱要放在獵物走的路上。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: pnteeyux mu mmaha smnegul tmlenga rudan alang, smluhe ku paha tlenga klaali, kika wada ku ini beyo mangal camac.
In order to go hunting with adults as soon as possible, I practiced making traps every day, and soon my traps can really catch prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 為了可以趕快和大人一起去打獵，我每天練習製作陷阱，很快地我的陷阱就真的可以抓到獵物了。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: qmita yaku ka tama mu ma, kesun ku na, maha su mkela riyung mangal camac ka isu bobo na.
Dad saw it and told me that I will be a very good hunter in the future.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸看到後對我說我以後一定會是很厲害的獵人。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: riso ku saya di, mapa ku budi mu ma raqic mu, smnegul ku tama mu mosa lmiqu.
Now that I have grown up, I carry my bow and arrows and go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我長大了，我背起我的弓和箭矢，跟著爸爸一起去打獵。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: dehuk ku alang de, wada mu saasu seediq alang ka nngalan mu.
When returning to the village, share the hunted prey with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 回村時將獵到的獵物和族人們分享。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: mesa ka tama mu, asi ta ka dmahur utux rudan ta, pngalun ta na egu ba ka camac.
Dad said, we want to thank the ancestors for their blessings, so that we have a lot of prey to harvest.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說，我們要感謝祖靈賜福，讓我們有很多獵物收穫。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Smrahuq ku mosa muuyas ka mgrebu.
I was late for school this morning.
我今天七點到學校。: 我早上上學遲到了。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Cmhungi ku, madis lubuy patis ka ciida.
When I was going to school, I forgot to bring my backpack.
我今天七點到學校。: 去學校的時候，我忘了帶書包。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Ini ku adis mmaanu duri.
I didn't bring anything with me.
我今天七點到學校。: 我什麼東西都沒有帶。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Muuyas de, msuupu ku gnxalan qmita patis.
During class, I and my classmates read the textbook together.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，我和同學一起看課本。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Psseung ciida, kbrexun kuna ppatis ma serus ka gnxalan.
During the exam, a classmate lent me a pen and an eraser.
我今天七點到學校。: 考試的時候，同學借我筆和橡皮擦。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mseru yaku ka mptgesa, “Bobo na grbui hari tutuy, iya srahuq di!”
The teacher told me, Wake up earlier next time and don't be late again!""
我今天七點到學校。: 老師跟我說：「下次早點起床，不要再遲到了!」

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Dangi mu ka Ukan, laqi Seediq ka heya duri.
My good friend’s name is Ukan, and he is also an Seediq child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的好朋友叫Ukan，他也是賽德克族的小孩。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Gaga miyan msuupu muuyas alang Tongan.
We study together in the Tongan tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們一起在眉溪部落讀書。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Msuupu miyan rudan mbahang rmengo kari ndaan klaali, mkela nami riyung rmengo kari Seediq.
We often listen to the elders telling stories together, and we both can speak the Seediq proficiently.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們常常一起聽耆老說故事，我們都很會說賽德族語。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Reko ma qtehur ka hnyegan mu, llebu ma kure hnyegan na ka Ukan.
I am tall and overweight, while Ukan is short and thin.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很高也很胖，Ukan很矮也很瘦。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mdrumuc riyung ka Ukan, smkuxul nami heya ka yami.
Ukan is very energetic, and everyone likes him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: Ukan很勤快，我們都很喜歡他。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Gaga psseung pstarin saya ka sapah pyasan, psqaras lnlamu pssengan.
Today was the school's sports day, and the school organized many competitions.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天是學校的運動會，學校舉辦了許多競賽。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Psseung mllebil snuyuk, metur cubu, tmalang, kmeeki ma cmebu budi.
There were tug of war, soccer, running, dancing, and archery.
我今天七點到學校。: 有拔河、足球、跑步、跳舞和射箭。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Psseung ku tmalang ka yaku.
I participated in the running competition.
我今天七點到學校。: 我比賽跑步。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Tmalang ku ciida, mntakur ku ma sddara pungu mu duri.
When I was running, I fell down, and my knees were bleeding.
我今天七點到學校。: 當我跑步的時候，我跌倒了，膝蓋流了很多血。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Ani si, mtutuy ma tmalang ku dungan.
But I stood up and continued running forward.
我今天七點到學校。: 但我站起來，繼續向前跑。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Dehuk ku puting pssengan de mqaras kana ka seediq.
Everyone was happy when I reached the finish line.
我今天七點到學校。: 我到終點時所有人都很開心。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Ani naq, ini ku angal ngayan tgkingal ma mqaras ka lnlungan mu, ado wada ku dehuk mhedu psseung.
Although I didn't get first place, I'm glad because I completed the race.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然沒有獲得第一名，但我很高興，因為我完成了比賽。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mnsuupu ku tama mosa qmita baki ka ciga.
Yesterday, my father and I visited my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我和爸爸去拜訪我的叔叔。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mluqah papak na ka baki di.
My uncle injured his foot.
我今天七點到學校。: 叔叔的腳受傷了。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Rngagun nami na ka heya, gaga tbeling ka dnamux di.
He told us that there was a hole in the roof of his house.
我今天七點到學校。: 他告訴我們，房子的屋頂破了一個洞。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Smmalu dnamux ciida ka heya, mntuting peeyah bobo dnamux.
He fell off the roof while repairing it.
我今天七點到學校。: 他在修理屋頂時，從屋頂摔下來了。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Saadis na hei dapa ma sbiki baki ka tama mu.
My father brought beef and betel nuts for my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸帶了牛肉和檳榔給叔叔。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Msuupu miyan mpprengo sapah tqiyan ka baki, rmengo kana kari ndaan na.
My uncle and I chatted in the room, and he shared many stories.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和叔叔在房間裡聊天，他分享了很多故事。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mmaha ku de mesa ka baki, nii ku reko ma mbtunux di.
Before I left, my uncle praised me for growing taller and becoming more handsome.
我今天七點到學校。: 我要離開前，叔叔誇我長高了，也變得更帥氣了。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mesa ku “Malu papak su de, eyah theyaq sapah nami ka bobo dhenu.”
I said, When your foot gets better
我今天七點到學校。: come to our house next time and visit us.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34669/5: 我說：「等叔叔腳好了，下次也來我們家玩。」

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Pnrdingan knkawas mpusan mpusan daha, lmawa prngagun sehu spatis ngayan Seediq ka patis pnyahan.
In 2022, the government announced that indigenous identification cards can include tribal names separately.
我今天七點到學校。: 在2022年，政府召開了原住民身分證可單列族名的會議。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Smiling ku Umin Kulas bsiyaq mbeyax skadi sehu spatis ngayan Seediq ka patis pnyahan.
I interviewed Umin Kulas, a young tribal member who has long been advocating for the inclusion of tribal names on identification cards.
我今天七點到學校。: 我訪問了長期向政府爭取身分證「單列族名」的部落青年Umin Kulas。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mpsterung nami ka ali gdregan nii, maha ku sapah na smiling heya.
We had arranged to visit his home this holiday for the interview.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和他約定好這個假日到他家訪問他。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mpprengo nami ciida, pgklaun kuna pusu ngayan na, desun kuna mgkela tnsapah na ma alang na duri.
During the interview, he introduced to me the origin of his name and also introduced me to his family and tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 在訪問的過程中，他向我介紹了他的名字的由來，也帶我認識了他的家人、他的部落。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Slingun mu, malux su ryuxun ka ngayan, naqah ngayan pntasan su cbeyo peni?
I asked him why he insisted on changing his name. Wasn’t the old registration method sufficient?
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他為什麼堅持要改名，舊的登記方式不好嗎?

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Kesun kuna, spooda matis kari Telu de uka dungus ka ngayan kiya, qnuuqu lmawa ngayan mesa Riso U" ma phlisun daha duri."
He told me that using Chinese characters could not accurately convey his name, and others would still call him \Wu Xian Sheng
我今天七點到學校。: \" which resulted in many jokes being made."
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34669/5: 他對我說，因為用中文字並不能準確的傳達他的族名，其他人還會叫他「巫先生」，也因此鬧出不少笑話。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mesa ka Umin Kulas Spatis kari Seediq ngayan ta naq ka bbale. Ngayan mu ge ririh pngalan luwan Seediq
tnsapah ma pnyahan nami
我今天七點到學校。: psmeyah ta tmngayan ngayan daha kana ka Seediq."
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34669/5: Umin Kulas said, \The names written in indigenous languages are our true names. My name represents our ethnic group
column6: our identity. I hope more fellow tribespeople can reclaim their own names.\""
column7: Umin Kulas說：「原住民語書寫的名字才是我們真正的名字。我的名字代表了我們的族群、我們的家族、我們的身分，希望能有更多族人找回自己的名字。」

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Mnsuupu ku bubu rudan mosa gnbaruy bbrigan ka ciga, madis egu sama pnhuma na ma sbege nami na snlmeyan ppuqun ta ita Seediq duri.
Yesterday, I went to the market with my grandmother to set up a stall. My grandmother brought a lot of vegetables that she grew herself and also prepared indigenous cuisine for everyone.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我跟奶奶去市集擺攤，奶奶帶了許多自己種的蔬菜去，也製作了原住民美食給大家。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Smkuxul meyah bbrigan na bubu rudan ka seediq, meyah maruy ucik ma ciyak rudu, egu seediq meyah kncheya mekan hnprayan na duri.
Everyone loved my grandmother’s stall. Many people bought the chilis and African eggplants, and many people came to taste the dishes she cooked.
我今天七點到學校。: 大家很喜歡奶奶的攤位，辣椒和絲瓜很多人買，許多人來品嘗她煮的菜餚。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Malu riyung puqun hnprayan na sama bale ma ido dhequy ka heya, pnsrubu hmangac hei boyak ma mao, smkenux kncheya na ka seediq, kika meyah msseli mtbeku bbrigan hini.
The Lactucin and sticky rice she cooked were delicious, as well as the braised pork with maqaw pepper and wild boar meat. The flavors attracted many customers, and everyone lined up at our stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 她煮的山萵苣和糯米飯非常好吃，還有用山豬肉煮的馬告滷肉，味道吸引了很多客人，大家都來我們攤位排隊。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Phpure ppuqun bubu rudan de, mosa ku smdamac seediq ka yaku. Lmawa ku Pnhuma nami naq kana sama nii
ini pdai cmuwaq iyu
我今天七點到學校。: naaguh meyah maruy!""

column5: all-natural and organic! Come and buy now!\""
column6: 奶奶煮東西的時候，我在旁邊招攬客人。我在一旁大喊著：「蔬菜都是自己種的，天然有機，趕快來買喔!」

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Wada asi brigi kana nadis miyan di, mesa bubu rudan Ado isu ka mneyah dmayo.""
Our goods sold out quickly, and my grandmother said, \It’s all thanks to your help.\""
我今天七點到學校。: 我們的東西很快就賣完了，奶奶說：「都是因為有你的幫忙。」

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Ooda nii ge, snluhe ku knklaan qqhuni ma ppuqun na Seediq, slluhe bbale oda gnbaruy duri.
Through this event, I learned about indigenous plants and food and experienced the hard work of running a stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個活動，我學到了有關原住民植物和食品的知識，並且體驗到了擺攤的辛苦。

Mpitu patis hido dehuk ku sapah pyasan a: Qmita ku snkuxul riyung ppuqun ncbeyo ka bubu rudan, malu bale ma sqaras mu ka ndaan na nii duri.
Seeing my grandmother’s passion for traditional food, I feel very proud and honored.
我今天七點到學校。: 看到了奶奶對傳統食物的熱愛，我感到非常驕傲和榮幸。
